data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Semenawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Semenawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 16,186 believers in Semenawi Keyih Bahri, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Semenawi Keyih Bahri, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Semenawi Keyih Bahri
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Arab, Sudanese people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, let the threatened of Semenawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Semenawi Keyih Bahri.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 300,579 who are far from you in Semenawi Keyih Bahri, Eritrea from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
